snippet: After an album (“Vida”) and a tour celebrating his recovery from cancer, the Long Island-born and Puerto Rico-raised Robi Draco Rosa is facing new challenges.
abstract: Profile of Robi Draco Rosa, Puerto Rican singer-songwriter, guitarist and producer who has renewed his struggle with cancer after a successful comeback album and accompanying tour.
lead_paragraph: After an album (“Vida”) and a tour celebrating his recovery from cancer, the Long Island-born and Puerto Rico-raised Robi Draco Rosa is facing new challenges.

headline.seo: After a Career Highlight, Draco Rosa Goes Home
headline.main: Life After ‘Vida’: One Man’s Time to Heal
headline.print_headline: Life After ‘Vida’: One Man’s Time to Heal
